text:
[Verse]
Lights are flashing bright
In the city night
People come alive
Dancing through the vibe

[Verse 2]
Stars above us shine
Drink a bit of wine
Laughing without care
Breathing in the air

[Chorus]
Under the glitter sky
We live we touch we fly
Feel the rhythm high
And never question why

[Verse 3]
Music all around
Lost in every sound
Hearts begin to race
Smiles upon each face

[Bridge]
Dreams we chase tonight
Hold each other tight
Glow of neon light
Everything's alright

[Chorus]
Under the glitter sky
We live we touch we fly
Feel the rhythm high
And never question why
title: Under the Glitter Sky
